Text: I-It's no good! Nothing's working! Run for your lives!

The Lawless City, a world where the law of the jungle
prevails, and might makes right. Now ghouls stalk the
streets in a frenzy, and streets in a frenzy, and shrieks fill the air as the
citizens flee in terror.

As the bedlam nears its peak, a lone, shadowy figure
walks against the panicked tide...
Flee, if you value your life...

Hey, man! Where the hell are you goin'?!
There's nothin' but ghouls that way!
The rampage is starting...

Hey, did you hear what I just said?! Keep goin' that
way and those things are gonna—
Leave him! You'll just get yourself killed, too!

Besides, anyone who'd willingly walk into the middle
of those things definitely ain't in their right mind.
...There is still more I must do.
H-Hey, what the hell're you—
Wha?! H-He's gone! But he was just here...
Who-Who the hell was that guy...?
The Red Moon... There isn't much time left...

My name is Shadow... I lurk in the darkness and hunt
down shadows.

Shadow points his sword at the Crimson Tower. Bathed
in moonlight, its blade glimmers an eerie red.

...Blood Queen. Face me tonight, beneath the
Red Moon.
...Heh.

(I nailed it! The ultimate shadowbroker power play
at the ultimate timing!)

(It's night! I'm looking down on city streets gripped
by panic! And best of all...there's a red moon in the
sky!)
It's perfect... All of it.

(Never thought I'd find a scene so ideal for
scratching stuff off my bucket list...)

(Throw in the Blood Queen as a boss and things
couldn't get any more awesome! The Lawless City
rules! Double that for the Red Moon!)

(Gotta save the boss battle for last, though.
Getting through the rest of my bucket list
comes first.)

(So I already did the "mysterious kid saying cryptic
stuff while everyone else flees" bit, which means
next—)
...Maybe I'll go with that one.
Graaarghhh!
St-Stay away...! I don't want to die—

—Just then, the window of a nearby building shatters,
and a black figure drops down along with the shards
of glass.
So slow.
Graaarrrr...
...Huh? I-I'm alive...?
It's not over yet.

Ghouls close in from all sides, as if drawn by the
commotion. But the black swordsman shows no
signs of fear.
It'll take more than numbers to defeat me!
Graaarrrr...
...Is that it?
W-Wait! What's your name...?
The rampage has begun... You would be wise to flee...
Rampage...? What do you mean?

That is of no concern to you. I shall lower the
curtain on tonight's events...
H-He's gone... I didn't even get to say thanks.
Heheh...hahaha...!

(Man, that rocked! A smashed window entrance followed
by a big fight! And then some enigmatic parting words
to put the cherry on top!)

(Normally a shadowbroker is supposed to appear
without a sound, but it doesn't hurt to arrive with
a bang every so often.)

(That extra's reaction was awesome too.
She sounded so much like a side character
that I oughtta be taking notes.)

(The Lawless City just keeps gettin' better and
better! I'm scratching off stuff on my list left
and right!)
Well, I suppose it's that time...

At the end of Shadow's gaze looms a tower bathed in
moonlight.

(Now all I gotta do is break into the tower, collect
the loot, and savor sweet victory after an epic
throwdown with the final boss.)

(Then I can cross off "Thus the crisis was resolved.
But none of those who fled would ever know the true
identity of the one who fought so fiercely on their
behalf behind the scenes... The End" bit!)

(A fitting shadowbroker send-off for the Lawless
City! The dream becomes a reality... Like seriously,
I couldn't have hoped for things to turn out better!)

...Sorry to keep you waiting, Blood Queen. Now that
the side show is over, I shall be with you shortly...

Turning his back on the chaos of the city, Shadow
sets forth for the Crimson Tower with renewed zeal—
